leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

unit.unit_name: 批次校正/整合/跨模态对齐

tools.name: loupeR
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Seurat objects to 10x Genomics Loupe browser files
tools.detailed_description: A utility package that enables the conversion of Seurat analysis objects into 10x Genomics Loupe files, facilitating interactive visualization of single-cell data in the Loupe Browser.

tools.name: refinebio
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for harmonizing publicly available biological data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive system that harmonizes petabytes of publicly available biological data (transcriptomics) into ready-to-use datasets for cancer researchers and AI/ML scientists, handling normalization and metadata processing.

tools.name: ROME
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel computing software for cryo-EM structure determination
tools.detailed_description: A software package dedicated to high-resolution cryo-EM structure determination and data analysis, implementing statistical manifold learning for deep classification and MAP-based image alignment in HPC environments.

tools.name: VoltRon
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial omic analysis toolbox for multi-resolution integration
tools.detailed_description: A spatial omic analysis toolbox designed for multi-resolution and multi-omic integration using image registration techniques, enabling the analysis of spatially resolved transcriptomics data.

tools.name: maui
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based multi-omics integration toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based toolkit for the integration of heterogeneous multi-omics data using autoencoders, facilitating latent feature extraction and downstream analysis.

tools.name: niCHART
tools.one_line_profile: Neuro-imaging brain aging chart and harmonization solution
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive solution to analyze standard structural and functional brain MRI data across studies, implementing computational morphometry, quality control, and statistical harmonization.

tools.name: ceLLama
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type annotation tool using local Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for single-cell type annotation leveraging local Large Language Models (LLMs) to ensure privacy and speed, providing customized reports for cell identity.

tools.name: scrna_seurat_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive analysis pipeline for single-cell transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline based on Seurat for the comprehensive analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, streamlining standard processing steps.

tools.name: Interactive-3D-Plotting-in-Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization tool for Seurat scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R tool enabling the creation of interactive 3D UMAP and tSNE plots for single-cell RNA-seq data analyzed with Seurat.

tools.name: traitdataform
tools.one_line_profile: Package to manage and compile ecological functional trait data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to assist in managing and compiling functional trait data into predefined templates, facilitating ecological data standardization.

tools.name: MTD
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for host and meta-transcriptome joint integrative analyses
tools.detailed_description: A unique pipeline designed for the joint and integrative analysis of host and meta-transcriptome RNA-seq data, facilitating simultaneous study of host gene expression and microbiome activity.

tools.name: CMTA
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-Modal Translation and Alignment for Survival Analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a cross-modal translation and alignment framework designed for medical survival analysis, integrating pathological images and genomic data.

tools.name: Healthcare Data Harmonization
tools.one_line_profile: Engine for converting healthcare data structures (HL7/FHIR)
tools.detailed_description: A data harmonization engine that converts healthcare data from one structure to another based on configuration files, supporting clinical data standardization and interoperability.

tools.name: ILTransR
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning framework for ionic liquid property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework empowered by transfer learning for predicting the properties of ionic liquids from limited labeled data.

tools.name: CMCM
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-Modal Alignment via Variational Copula Modelling
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic framework for cross-modal alignment using variational copula modelling, applicable to medical imaging and multi-modal data analysis.

tools.name: MGCA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Granularity Cross-modal Alignment for Medical Visual Representation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for generalized medical visual representation learning via multi-granularity cross-modal alignment, improving pre-training for medical imaging tasks.

tools.name: CustOmics
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning framework for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A versatile deep learning framework designed for the integration of multi-omics data to facilitate downstream analysis and discovery.

tools.name: AWGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Batch Effect Removal Model for scRNA-seq Data
tools.detailed_description: A Wasserstein GAN-based model for removing batch effects in single-cell RNA sequencing data while preserving biological heterogeneity.

tools.name: CVQVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning for multi-omics single cell integration
tools.detailed_description: A representation learning method using VQ-VAE for integrating multi-omics single-cell data.

tools.name: scVIC
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative modeling of heterogeneity for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model designed to capture and analyze heterogeneity in single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: SOC-DRaHR
tools.one_line_profile: Soil organic carbon data recovery and harmonization
tools.detailed_description: Tools and scripts for the recovery and harmonization of soil organic carbon data, facilitating environmental data analysis.

tools.name: Spectre
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for high-dimensional cytometry and imaging data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computational toolkit in R for the integration, exploration, and analysis of high-dimensional single-cell cytometry and imaging data.

tools.name: STalign
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment of spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the alignment of spatial transcriptomics (ST) data using diffeomorphic metric mapping to correct for tissue distortions.

tools.name: liger
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Iterative Gene set Enrichment in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for single-cell data analysis, often associated with the LIGER method for integrating multiple single-cell datasets (though description here varies, context implies integration utility).

tools.name: FishData
tools.one_line_profile: Compile and harmonize fishery-independent survey data
tools.detailed_description: R package to compile and harmonize catch rates from various fishery-independent surveys of fish populations for ecological analysis.

tools.name: manifold_alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping multiple high-dimensional datasets to common space
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for performing manifold alignment, mapping multiple high-dimensional datasets into a common low-dimensional space, useful for multi-omics integration.

tools.name: CellANOVA
tools.one_line_profile: Signal recovery in single cell batch integration
tools.detailed_description: Cell State Space Analysis of Variance (CellANOVA) for recovering biological signals during single-cell batch integration.

tools.name: ComBatHarmonization
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonization of multi-site imaging data with ComBat
tools.detailed_description: R implementation of the ComBat algorithm for harmonizing multi-site imaging data to remove site/scanner effects.

tools.name: neuroCombat
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonization of multi-site imaging data with ComBat (Python)
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of the ComBat algorithm for harmonizing multi-site imaging data, widely used in neuroimaging studies.

tools.name: SIFA-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised Bidirectional Cross-Modality Adaptation for Medical Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of SIFA, a method for unsupervised bidirectional cross-modality adaptation via synergistic image and feature alignment for medical image segmentation.

tools.name: FastIntegration
tools.one_line_profile: Fast integration of large-scale scRNA-seq datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to integrate thousands of scRNA-seq datasets and output batch-corrected values for downstream analysis efficiently.

tools.name: SpatialGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for spatial multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based deep learning method for integrating spatial multi-omics data to decipher tissue heterogeneity.

tools.name: OpenOmics
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics API for multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics API to interface with public multi-omics bio databases for fast data integration and analysis.

tools.name: MIAAIM
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics Image Alignment and Analysis by Information Manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A software framework for aligning and analyzing multi-omics imaging data using information manifolds.

tools.name: bindSC
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-order integration of single cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: A method for the integration of single-cell RNA sequencing, ATAC sequencing, spatial transcriptomics, and CyTOF data.

tools.name: RasterSmith
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tool for NASA Earth observing satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A package to preprocess different NASA Earth observing satellite data products into common resolution, spatial reference, and format.

tools.name: VBCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Bayesian Canonical Correlation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Variational Bayesian Canonical Correlation Analysis (VBCCA), often used for multi-view data integration in neuroscience and bioinformatics.

tools.name: SmCCNet
tools.one_line_profile: CCA-based method for discovering regulatory networks
tools.detailed_description: A canonical correlation analysis based method for discovering phenotype-specific multi-omics regulatory networks.

tools.name: MOGONET
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Graph Convolutional Networks for classification
tools.detailed_description: A framework for multi-omics data integrative analysis using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) for biomedical classification tasks.

tools.name: COSMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Computational tool for integrating spatially resolved multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: COSMOS is a computational tool designed to integrate spatially resolved multi-omics data using graph neural networks, enabling analysis within a spatial framework.

tools.name: StabMap
tools.one_line_profile: Mosaic single cell data integration using non-overlapping features
tools.detailed_description: StabMap is a method for integrating mosaic single cell data, allowing for the combination of datasets with non-overlapping features.

tools.name: DeepCCA
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis (DCCA) using PyTorch, useful for learning complex nonlinear transformations of two views of data such that the resulting representations are highly correlated.

tools.name: SCViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: SCViewer is a Java-based tool for visualizing single-cell data, providing an interface for exploring complex datasets.

tools.name: scMiko
tools.one_line_profile: R package for single-cell RNA-seq analysis based on Seurat
tools.detailed_description: scMiko is an R package developed for single-cell RNA-seq analysis, designed using the Seurat framework to offer analytic workflows.

tools.name: Data-Ingestion-and-Harmonization
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical data ingestion and harmonization pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A repository for data ingestion and harmonization processes, developed by the National Clinical Cohort Collaborative.

tools.name: CyteType
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent LLM driven cell type annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: CyteType utilizes multi-agent Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform automated cell type annotation for single-cell RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: CyteTypeR
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of CyteType for cell type annotation
tools.detailed_description: The R version of CyteType, providing multi-agent LLM driven cell type annotation for single-cell RNA-Seq data within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: scDEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep transfer learning for drug sensitivity prediction
tools.detailed_description: scDEAL is a deep transfer learning method for predicting drug sensitivity by integrating bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: CellWalkR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for integrating single-cell and bulk data
tools.detailed_description: CellWalkR is an R package designed to integrate single-cell and bulk data to resolve regulatory elements.

tools.name: MuDataSeurat
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for .h5mu files in Seurat
tools.detailed_description: MuDataSeurat provides an interface for loading and interacting with .h5mu (multimodal) files within the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: BENGAL
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for cross-species scRNA-seq integration
tools.detailed_description: BENGAL is a Nextflow pipeline designed for the cross-species integration and assessment of single-cell RNA-seq datasets.

tools.name: APackOfTheClones
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of clonal expansion via circle-packing for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package that extends scRepertoire to visualize clonal expansion at single-cell resolution using circle packing, allowing for intuitive representation of clone sizes and distributions.

tools.name: MOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Variational autoEncoder for data integration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework using Variational AutoEncoders (VAE) to integrate multi-omics data and identify cross-modal associations, facilitating the analysis of heterogeneous biological datasets.

tools.name: taxo_harmonization
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for harmonizing taxon names in biodiversity data
tools.detailed_description: Companion code and tools for reviewing and implementing best practices in harmonizing taxon names across biodiversity databases, aiding in ecological data standardization.

tools.name: reproschema
tools.one_line_profile: Schema for standardized data collection and harmonization
tools.detailed_description: A standardized form generation and data collection schema designed to harmonize results across neuroimaging and psychological projects by design, ensuring reproducibility.

tools.name: EAT
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based annotation transfer for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses Euclidean distance between protein vector representations (embeddings) to transfer annotations from labeled lookup proteins to query proteins.

tools.name: tlCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning Canonical Correlation Analysis for SSVEP-BCIs
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of transfer learning based Canonical Correlation Analysis (tlCCA) specifically designed for processing SSVEP signals in Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs).

tools.name: INTEND
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of Transcriptomic and EpigeNomic Data
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for integrating gene expression and DNA methylation datasets that cover disjoint sets of samples, enabling cross-modal analysis in multi-omics studies.

tools.name: ACTINN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Cell-Types Identification using Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the ACTINN algorithm for automatic cell-type identification in single-cell RNA sequencing data using neural networks.

tools.name: HC-MAE
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Cross-attention Masked Autoencoder for cancer survival prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model integrating histopathological images and multi-omics data via hierarchical cross-attention masked autoencoders for predicting cancer survival outcomes.

tools.name: MultiMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of single cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for integrating single-cell multi-omics data, allowing for the visualization and analysis of heterogeneous single-cell datasets in a shared latent space.

tools.name: bbknn
tools.one_line_profile: Batch balanced KNN for single-cell data integration
tools.detailed_description: A fast and lightweight batch effect correction tool for single-cell RNA-seq data that modifies the k-nearest neighbor graph to enforce connections between batches.

tools.name: cellhint
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automatic cell type harmonization and integration
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the semi-automatic harmonization and integration of cell types across different datasets, facilitating the creation of unified cell atlases.

tools.name: drug2cell
tools.one_line_profile: Gene group activity utility functions for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A utility package for Scanpy that facilitates the analysis of drug target gene group activities within single-cell transcriptomics data.

tools.name: scanpy_recipes
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregated analysis functions for Anndata and Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generalized and aggregated analysis functions and recipes for processing single-cell data using Anndata and Scanpy frameworks.

tools.name: bdi-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for biomedical data integration and harmonization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to facilitate the integration and harmonization of diverse biomedical datasets, supporting data matching and schema alignment.

tools.name: DeepCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Keras implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis (DCCA), a method widely used in bioinformatics for learning non-linear transformations to maximize correlation between two views of data (e.g., multi-omics).

tools.name: scINSIGHT
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix factorization for interpreting heterogeneous single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A method based on matrix factorization to identify common biological patterns and interpret gene expression in biologically heterogeneous single-cell data.

tools.name: Portal
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial domain translation for integrating single-cell atlases
tools.detailed_description: A framework using adversarial domain translation networks to integrate large-scale atlas-level single-cell datasets, preserving biological variation while removing batch effects.

tools.name: SpatialScope
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of spatial and single-cell transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A unified approach leveraging deep generative models to integrate spatial transcriptomics and single-cell RNA-seq data, enhancing spatial resolution and gene imputation.

tools.name: Semi-supervised-Cardiac-Image-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised cardiac image segmentation model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a semi-supervised method for cardiac image segmentation using label propagation and style transfer, developed for the MICCAI 2020 M&Ms challenge.

tools.name: scib-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated metrics for single-cell integration benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing accelerated implementations of metrics used for benchmarking single-cell integration methods, facilitating rapid evaluation of integration quality.

tools.name: treedata
tools.one_line_profile: AnnData extension for tree-structured data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends the AnnData object to support tree-structured data, useful for phylogenetic or hierarchical analysis in single-cell genomics.

tools.name: GCN-SC
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Networks for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A universal framework utilizing Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) to integrate single-cell multi-omics data, capturing complex relationships between cells and features.

tools.name: scCATCH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic annotation of cell types for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package for automatic annotation of cell types in single-cell RNA sequencing data clusters based on tissue-specific cell taxonomy reference databases.

tools.name: scDREAMER
tools.one_line_profile: Atlas-level integration of single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model paired with an adversarial classifier for the atlas-level integration of single-cell datasets, handling batch effects and biological heterogeneity.

tools.name: wgcca
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Weighted Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis (WGCCA), a statistical method for analyzing relationships between multiple sets of variables, applicable to multi-omics integration.

tools.name: netOmics
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics multi-layered network integration
tools.detailed_description: An R package for multi-omics multi-layered network integration and interpretation, aiding in the systems biology analysis of complex biological interactions.

tools.name: Pamona
tools.one_line_profile: Partial manifold alignment algorithm for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: Pamona is a software implementing a partial manifold alignment algorithm designed to integrate heterogeneous single-cell multi-omics datasets, handling non-overlapping cells and features.

tools.name: uniPort
tools.one_line_profile: Unified single-cell data integration framework using optimal transport
tools.detailed_description: uniPort is a framework for integrating single-cell data across different modalities and batches using optimal transport theory to align distributions.

tools.name: STACAS
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised integration of single-cell transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: STACAS is an R package for the integration of single-cell RNA-seq datasets, capable of identifying and preserving biological heterogeneity while correcting for batch effects using a semi-supervised approach.

tools.name: NetICS
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based integration of multi-omics data for cancer gene prioritization
tools.detailed_description: NetICS is a computational method for integrating multi-omics data on a biological network to prioritize cancer genes by propagating signals across the network.

tools.name: Seurat-Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for Seurat providing access to integration methods and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: Seurat-Integrate expands the integrative analysis capabilities of the Seurat package by providing seamless access to popular integration methods and a benchmarking toolkit.

tools.name: TopicVelo
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of bursty transcriptional dynamics for RNA velocity analysis
tools.detailed_description: TopicVelo is a method for the dissection and integration of bursty transcriptional dynamics, enhancing RNA velocity analysis in complex biological systems.

tools.name: DeepIMV
tools.one_line_profile: Deep variational information bottleneck for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: DeepIMV is a deep learning framework based on the variational information bottleneck principle for the integration and analysis of multi-omics data.

tools.name: mnnpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of MNN batch correction
tools.detailed_description: mnnpy is a Python implementation of the Mutual Nearest Neighbors (MNN) batch effect correction method, originally developed in R.

tools.name: irGSEA
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of rank-based gene set enrichment analysis for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: irGSEA integrates multiple rank-based gene set enrichment analysis methods to provide robust functional enrichment results for single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: DataHarmonizer
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based spreadsheet editor for data harmonization and validation
tools.detailed_description: DataHarmonizer is a standardized, browser-based spreadsheet editor and validator designed to harmonize data entry according to specific templates, widely used for pathogen genomics data.

tools.name: sentle
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale Sentinel-1 & Sentinel-2 data cube processing and harmonization
tools.detailed_description: sentle is a Python tool for creating and processing large-scale Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data cubes, featuring integrated cloud detection, snow masking, and data harmonization.

tools.name: epiScanpy
tools.one_line_profile: Epigenomics single-cell analysis toolkit in Python
tools.detailed_description: epiScanpy is a toolkit for the analysis of single-cell epigenomics data (scATAC-seq, scDNA methylation), providing preprocessing, clustering, and integration capabilities similar to Scanpy.

tools.name: grassp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based analysis of subcellular spatial proteomics
tools.detailed_description: GRaph-based Analysis of Subcellular/Spatial Proteomics (grassp) is a tool for analyzing spatial proteomics data using graph-based methods to understand subcellular organization.

tools.name: rPanglaoDB
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for PanglaoDB single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: rPanglaoDB is an R package designed to download, merge, and integrate labeled single-cell RNA-seq data directly from the PanglaoDB database into Seurat objects.

tools.name: r-seurat-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Bioconda-ready scripts for Seurat workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R scripts wrapping Seurat functionality, designed to be installed as a Bioconda package for building reproducible single-cell analysis workflows.

tools.name: scanpy-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line scripts for Scanpy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of command-line scripts for running Scanpy analysis tasks, facilitating the integration of Scanpy into automated workflows and pipelines.

tools.name: scanpy-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for Scanpy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow implementation that leverages scanpy-scripts to execute reproducible single-cell analysis pipelines.

tools.name: SCpubr
tools.one_line_profile: Publication-ready visualization library for single-cell transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package designed to generate high-quality, publication-ready visualizations for single-cell RNA-seq data, streamlining the creation of complex plots from Seurat objects.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for performing differential expression analyses (DEA) on multimodal single-cell/nucleus RNA-seq data, powered by the Seurat R package.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen analysis using Seurat Mixscape
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow module for performing perturbation analyses of pooled CRISPR screens with single-cell RNA-seq readout (scCRISPR-seq), utilizing Seurat's Mixscape method.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for scRNA-seq data processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing and visualizing multimodal single-cell/nucleus RNA-seq data (10X Genomics or MTX format), leveraging Seurat for downstream analysis.

tools.name: pyrcca
tools.one_line_profile: Regularized Kernel Canonical Correlation Analysis in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing regularized kernel canonical correlation analysis (CCA), widely used in neuroscience for analyzing fMRI data and other multivariate datasets.

tools.name: GLUE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-linked unified embedding for single-cell multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for integrating unpaired single-cell multi-omics data by learning a graph-linked unified embedding, enabling cross-modal alignment and regulatory inference.

tools.name: AMARETTO
tools.one_line_profile: Regulatory network inference and driver gene evaluation tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package for integrating multi-omics data to infer regulatory networks and identify driver genes using penalized regression methods.

tools.name: mofaplus-shiny
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Shiny application for MOFA+ models
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny-based interactive tool for exploring and visualizing models generated by Multi-Omics Factor Analysis (MOFA+).

tools.name: PieParty
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for plotting pie charts on UMAP embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to visualize single-cell data by representing each cell or cluster in UMAP plots as a pie chart, useful for displaying composition or multi-label data.

tools.name: harmony
tools.one_line_profile: Data harmonization tool for psychology research
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for psychologists to harmonize data and questionnaire items across different studies, facilitating meta-analysis and data integration.

tools.name: CCA-SSG
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method combining CCA and Graph Neural Networks for multi-view data learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'From Canonical Correlation Analysis to Self-supervised Graph Neural Networks', providing a solver for multi-view representation learning which is applicable to multi-omics integration.

tools.name: IntegratedLearner
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Machine Learning framework for Multi-omics Classification and Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework designed for the integration of multi-omics data to perform classification and prediction tasks.

tools.name: brainmapr
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial mapping of neuronal subpopulations by integrating scRNA-seq and in situ RNA patterns
tools.detailed_description: An R package to infer the spatial location of neuronal subpopulations within the developing mouse brain by integrating single-cell RNA-seq data with in situ RNA patterns.

tools.name: MOLI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Late Integration with deep neural networks for drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for integrating multi-omics data (somatic mutation, CNA, and gene expression) to predict drug response.

tools.name: scanoncorr
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse canonical correlation analysis (SCCA) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis, a statistical method used for integrating two sets of variables, commonly applied in multi-omics data integration.

tools.name: scanpy-mcp
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: An interface tool that exposes Scanpy's single-cell analysis capabilities via the Model Context Protocol, enabling AI agents to perform single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: scETM
tools.one_line_profile: Generative topic model for integrative analysis of large-scale scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A generative topic model (single-cell Embedded Topic Model) designed to facilitate the integrative analysis of large-scale single-cell RNA sequencing data, handling batch effects and data integration.

tools.name: VegX
tools.one_line_profile: R functions to import, integrate, and harmonize vegetation data
tools.detailed_description: A set of functions to import, integrate, harmonize and export vegetation data using the VegX exchange standard, facilitating data interoperability in ecology.

tools.name: infercnvpy
tools.one_line_profile: Infer copy number variation (CNV) from scRNA-seq data within the Scanpy ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to infer copy number variation (CNV) from single-cell RNA-seq data, designed to integrate seamlessly with Scanpy workflows.

tools.name: Harmony
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate integration of single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for projecting cells into a shared embedding in which cells group by cell type rather than dataset-specific conditions, widely used for batch correction and integration.

tools.name: Symphony
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient and precise single-cell reference atlas mapping
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping query single-cell data onto reference atlases constructed with Harmony, enabling rapid annotation and integration.

tools.name: cellxgene_VIP
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis plugin for cellxgene
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that extends cellxgene with advanced visualization capabilities (violin plots, heatmaps, volcano plots) and analysis functions (differential expression), facilitating interactive data exploration.

tools.name: HyperTMO
tools.one_line_profile: Hypergraph convolutional network for multi-omics integration
tools.detailed_description: A trusted multi-omics integration framework based on Hypergraph convolutional networks for patient classification and data integration.

tools.name: mixedCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse CCA for mixed data types
tools.detailed_description: R package for sparse canonical correlation analysis designed to handle mixed data types (continuous, binary, zero-truncated), suitable for integrating diverse omics data.

tools.name: cca_zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for Canonical Correlation Analysis methods
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Regularized, Deep Learning based, Kernel, and Probabilistic CCA methods implemented in a scikit-learn style framework, facilitating multi-view data analysis.

tools.name: autoencodix
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoder framework for multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing autoencoders for the integration of multi-omics data, enabling dimensionality reduction and feature extraction across modalities.

tools.name: longCombat
tools.one_line_profile: Longitudinal ComBat for batch effect correction
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing longitudinal ComBat, a method for harmonizing multi-batch longitudinal data while preserving biological trends.

tools.name: ODG
tools.one_line_profile: Omics Database Generator integration toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for integrating and managing omics data, facilitating the generation of databases for multi-omics analysis.

tools.name: scbean
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for single-cell data analysis, including methods for integration and removal of batch effects.

tools.name: SCISSORS
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized reclustering for Seurat to identify rare cell types
tools.detailed_description: A tool that builds upon Seurat's clustering to optimize parameter selection when reclustering cell groups, specifically aiming to identify rare cell types.

tools.name: SCALEX
tools.one_line_profile: Online single-cell data integration via common cell-embedding space
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for online integration of single-cell data by projecting heterogeneous datasets into a common cell-embedding space, handling batch effects without retraining.

tools.name: BEER
tools.one_line_profile: Batch EffEct Remover for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to remove batch effects from single-cell data, facilitating the integration of datasets from different sources.

tools.name: ggSCvis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of SingleCell data using ggplot2
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a wrapper around ggplot2 for easy and effective visualization of single-cell data.

tools.name: MATCHER
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Alignment for integrating single cell transcriptomic and epigenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for integrating single-cell transcriptomic and epigenomic data using manifold alignment to characterize experimental relationships.

tools.name: scgenetics
tools.one_line_profile: Identifying disease critical cell types and programs from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing single-cell RNA-seq data to identify disease-critical cell types and genetic programs.

tools.name: conos
tools.one_line_profile: Joint analysis of multiple single-cell RNA-seq datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the integration and joint analysis of multiple single-cell RNA-seq datasets, relying on graph-based connectivity.

tools.name: clonealign
tools.one_line_profile: Integrating scRNA-seq and scDNA-seq for clone-specific expression inference
tools.detailed_description: A Bayesian method to infer clone-specific gene expression by integrating single-cell RNA-seq and single-cell DNA-seq data.

tools.name: MIDAS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for mosaic single-cell multimodal data integration
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the MIDAS algorithm (Nature Biotechnology 2024) for integrating single-cell multimodal data. It handles mosaic integration, imputation, and batch correction across different modalities.

tools.name: DeepProg
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for multi-omic and survival data integration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed to integrate multi-omics data with survival outcomes. It uses autoencoders to extract features and predict patient survival, facilitating biomarker discovery.

tools.name: Cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization platform for large-scale single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that enables interactive exploration of large-scale single-cell datasets. It supports various data formats and provides a web-based interface for viewing embeddings, gene expression, and metadata.

tools.name: BenchmarkST
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for spatial transcriptomics analysis methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating clustering, alignment, and integration methods in spatial transcriptomics. It provides metrics and datasets to assess the performance of various computational tools.

tools.name: scVI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia implementation of scVI for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that implements the scVI (single-cell Variational Inference) model. It allows for probabilistic modeling of single-cell count data, enabling tasks like dimensionality reduction and batch correction within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: SignacX
tools.one_line_profile: Cell type identification and discovery tool for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for cell type identification and discovery in single-cell RNA-seq data. It leverages neural networks to classify cells and identify novel cell types, often used in conjunction with Seurat.

tools.name: ReductionWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: R wrappers for Python dimensionality reduction tools in single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of R wrappers that facilitate the use of Python-based dimensionality reduction tools (like UMAP, t-SNE variants) directly within R single-cell analysis workflows (e.g., Seurat, SingleCellExperiment).

tools.name: FIRM
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible integration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data for large-scale multi-tissue cell atlas datasets
tools.detailed_description: FIRM is an algorithm designed for the integration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data, specifically optimized for large-scale multi-tissue cell atlas datasets to handle batch effects and align populations.

tools.name: CLEAR
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised contrastive learning for integrative single-cell RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: CLEAR leverages self-supervised contrastive learning to perform integrative analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, aiming to overcome batch effects and learn robust representations.

tools.name: seurat-disk
tools.one_line_profile: Interfaces for HDF5-based Single Cell File Formats within the Seurat ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: Provides support for the h5Seurat file format and interfaces between Seurat and AnnData/H5AD, facilitating data exchange and on-disk processing for large single-cell datasets.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive web platform that provides a user-friendly interface for performing various bioinformatics analyses, including bulk and single-cell RNA-seq, without requiring extensive coding skills.

tools.name: SeuratWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based interactive wizard for guided single-cell RNA-seq data analysis based on Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web application that guides users through the Seurat analysis pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data, facilitating clustering and visualization for non-programmers.

tools.name: seuratv3wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based interactive wizard for Seurat v3 single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A version of the SeuratWizard specifically tailored for Seurat v3 workflows, enabling guided analysis and clustering of single-cell transcriptomics data.

tools.name: neuroCombat
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonizing neuroimaging data across scanners and sites using ComBat
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ComBat algorithm for harmonizing neuroimaging data (e.g., cortical thickness, DTI) to remove site/scanner effects while preserving biological variability. Highly relevant to batch correction tasks.

tools.name: pyPARAGON
tools.one_line_profile: PAgeRAnk-flux on Graphlet-guided network for multi-Omic data integratioN
tools.detailed_description: A tool for multi-omic data integration and network inference that utilizes PageRank-flux algorithms on graphlet-guided networks to uncover biological relationships.

tools.name: scdownstream
tools.one_line_profile: A single cell transcriptomics pipeline for QC, integration and reporting
tools.detailed_description: An nf-core pipeline designed for downstream analysis of single-cell transcriptomics data, covering quality control, data integration, and report generation.

tools.name: adpbulk
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for pseudobulking single-cell data from AnnData objects
tools.detailed_description: A utility to aggregate single-cell data (pseudobulk) from AnnData objects, facilitating downstream bulk RNA-seq style analyses on single-cell datasets.

tools.name: knncmi
tools.one_line_profile: Estimation of conditional mutual information using nearest neighbors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for estimating mutual information (MI) and conditional mutual information (CMI) using k-nearest neighbors, widely used in scientific data analysis for network inference and dependency detection.

tools.name: CGCCP_2023
tools.one_line_profile: scVI extension for unspliced RNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an extension to the scVI model specifically for handling unspliced RNA in single-cell sequencing data, enabling kinetic modeling and velocity analysis.

tools.name: amLDS
tools.one_line_profile: Aligned mixture of latent dynamical systems for manifold alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implements the 'Aligned mixture of latent dynamical systems' (amLDS) model for probabilistic manifold alignment, particularly useful for decoding stimuli and aligning neural dynamics across different subjects.

tools.name: ManifoldAlignment
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold Alignment algorithms implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of manifold alignment algorithms, which are techniques used to align datasets from different domains (e.g., different modalities or batches) into a shared low-dimensional space.

tools.name: FoF
tools.one_line_profile: Focus-oriented Representation Learning and Multi-view Cross-modal Alignment for Glioma Grading
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for glioma grading that employs focus-oriented representation learning and multi-view cross-modal alignment to integrate medical imaging data.

tools.name: fscca
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Fast Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis (fscca) using NIPALS SCCA and Rcpp, providing efficient multi-view data integration capabilities.

tools.name: ennemi
tools.one_line_profile: Easy Nearest Neighbor Estimation of Mutual Information
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for fast and accurate estimation of mutual information between continuous variables using nearest neighbor methods, suitable for analyzing dependencies in scientific data.

tools.name: symphonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python port of the Symphony algorithm for single-cell reference mapping
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Symphony algorithm, enabling efficient mapping of query single-cell datasets onto integrated reference atlases.

tools.name: Banksy_py
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm unifying cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: BANKSY is a spatial clustering algorithm that unifies cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation for spatial transcriptomics analysis.

tools.name: scplotter
tools.one_line_profile: R package for easy and efficient visualization of single-cell sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: scplotter is an R package built upon plotthis, providing a set of functions to visualize single-cell sequencing data efficiently.

tools.name: scAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based tool for alignment and integration of single cell genomic data
tools.detailed_description: scAlign is a deep learning-based tool for alignment and integration of single cell genomic data across multiple datasets, species, conditions, and batches.

tools.name: PASTE
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments
tools.detailed_description: PASTE (Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments) is a method for aligning and integrating spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: PASTE2
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments v.2
tools.detailed_description: PASTE2 is the second version of the Probabilistic Alignment of Spatial Transcriptomics Experiments tool.

tools.name: SMAI
tools.one_line_profile: Alignability testing and integration of single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: SMAI provides methods for alignability testing and integration of single-cell data.

tools.name: GCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of Generalized Canonical Correlation Analysis (GCCA), useful for multi-view data integration.

tools.name: MOFAcellulaR
tools.one_line_profile: Infer multicellular programs from single-cell data using MOFA
tools.detailed_description: R package to infer multicellular programs from single-cell data using multi-omics factor analysis (MOFA).

tools.name: COSMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Causal Oriented Search of Multi-Omic Space
tools.detailed_description: COSMOS is a method that integrates phosphoproteomics, transcriptomics, and metabolomics data sets to search for causal links.

tools.name: scCustomize
tools.one_line_profile: Functions for visualization and analysis of single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: R package with a collection of functions created and/or curated to aid in the visualization and analysis of single-cell data using R.

tools.name: Azimuth
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for mapping datasets using Seurat reference data
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny web app for mapping datasets using Seurat v4, enabling reference-based annotation.

tools.name: Seurat
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for single cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: Seurat is an R toolkit for single cell genomics, designed for QC, analysis, and exploration of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: SeuratData
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset distribution for Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A mechanism for distributing and loading datasets for use with the Seurat R package.

tools.name: SeuratWrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Community-provided extensions to Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A collection of community-provided extensions and wrappers for the Seurat package, enabling integration with other tools.

tools.name: sc-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Functions and templates for single-cell data analysis with Scanpy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of project templates and useful functions for single-cell data analysis with Scanpy.

tools.name: EMOGI
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable multi-omics graph integration method
tools.detailed_description: EMOGI is an explainable multi-omics graph integration method based on graph convolutional networks to predict cancer genes.

tools.name: AnnData
tools.one_line_profile: Annotated data structure for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: AnnData provides a scalable way to store annotated data matrices, widely used in single-cell analysis (e.g., with Scanpy).

tools.name: Muon
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal omics Python framework
tools.detailed_description: Muon is a Python framework for multimodal omics analysis, designed to work with AnnData and Scanpy.

tools.name: Scanpy
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable single-cell analysis in Python
tools.detailed_description: Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data, including preprocessing, visualization, clustering, and trajectory inference.

tools.name: scirpy
tools.one_line_profile: Scanpy extension for single-cell TCR and BCR analysis
tools.detailed_description: Scirpy is a Scanpy extension to analyse single-cell T-cell receptor (TCR) and B-cell receptor (BCR) data.

tools.name: scvi-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data
tools.detailed_description: scvi-tools is a library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell and spatial omics data, providing various models for integration and analysis.

tools.name: Alleloscope
tools.one_line_profile: Allele-specific copy number estimation for single cell DNA and ATAC
tools.detailed_description: Alleloscope is a method for allele-specific copy number estimation applied to single cell DNA and ATAC sequencing data, allowing integrative multi-omic analysis.

tools.name: OmicsPLS
tools.one_line_profile: High dimensional data analysis and integration with O2PLS
tools.detailed_description: OmicsPLS is an R package for high dimensional data analysis and integration using the O2PLS method.

tools.name: scvis
tools.one_line_profile: Dimension reduction for high-dimensional biological data
tools.detailed_description: scvis is a Python package for dimension reduction of high-dimensional biological data, specifically designed for single-cell data visualization.

tools.name: deepcca
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis (DCCA) for learning non-linear transformations of two views.

tools.name: MARIO (mario-py)
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell proteomic data matching and integration tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of MARIO for integrating single-cell proteomic data using both shared and distinct features to perform matching and alignment.

tools.name: harmonypy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Harmony single-cell integration algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python port of the Harmony algorithm for integrating multiple high-dimensional datasets (e.g., scRNA-seq) by projecting them into a shared embedding and correcting for batch effects using fuzzy k-means.

tools.name: scGeneFit-python
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic marker selection using linear programming
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for selecting gene markers from single-cell gene expression data using linear programming to optimize recoverability of cell labels.

tools.name: scAI
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised integrative analysis of single-cell multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the unsupervised integration of single-cell multi-omics data (e.g., scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq) to identify cell subpopulations and infer regulatory relationships.

tools.name: mousipy
tools.one_line_profile: Ortholog mapping tool for converting mouse to human gene symbols
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool to translate AnnData objects containing mouse gene symbols into human gene symbols (or vice versa) using Biomart ortholog mappings, facilitating cross-species integration.

tools.name: tidygate
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive gating for single-cell data in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that allows users to interactively define gates on scatter plots to label elements (cells) within the Tidyverse ecosystem.

tools.name: tidyseurat
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse-style interface for Seurat objects
tools.detailed_description: An adapter package that enables the manipulation and visualization of Seurat single-cell data objects using Tidyverse principles and syntax.

tools.name: cca_zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) variants
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various Canonical Correlation Analysis methods (CCA, GCCA, DCCA, etc.), which are foundational algorithms for multi-view data integration in bioinformatics.

tools.name: SingCellaR
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative analysis tool for large-scale scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the processing, analysis, and visualization of large-scale single-cell RNA-sequencing data, including clustering and trajectory analysis.

tools.name: DRVI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Disentangled Representation Learning for Single-Cell Omics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for learning disentangled representations of single-cell omics data, enabling the separation of biological variation from technical noise.

tools.name: anndata2ri
tools.one_line_profile: Converter between AnnData (Python) and SingleCellExperiment (R)
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool facilitating seamless conversion between the AnnData format used in Scanpy and the SingleCellExperiment format used in R/Bioconductor, enabling cross-language workflows.

tools.name: Multigrate
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omic data integration for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for integrating paired single-cell multi-omics data, learning joint representations for downstream analysis.

tools.name: NCEM
tools.one_line_profile: Node-Centric Expression Models for cell communication
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework for modeling cell-cell communication and spatial dependencies in spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: scArches
tools.one_line_profile: Reference mapping and transfer learning for single-cell genomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for mapping new single-cell query datasets onto reference atlases without retraining, enabling efficient data integration and annotation transfer.

tools.name: scGen
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell perturbation prediction using variational autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A generative model to predict single-cell gene expression responses to perturbations (e.g., drugs, infections) by learning from control and treated conditions.

tools.name: scib
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for single-cell data integration methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library of metrics and pipelines for evaluating the performance of single-cell data integration methods, assessing both batch correction and biological conservation.

tools.name: sCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis (sCCA) implementation
tools.detailed_description: An R implementation of Sparse Canonical Correlation Analysis, a statistical method often used for integrating multi-view biological data.

tools.name: TCGAplot
tools.one_line_profile: R package for pan-cancer multi-omics analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R toolkit for performing pan-cancer differential expression analysis, correlation analysis (gene expression vs TMB/MSI/TIME), and visualization of multi-omics data from TCGA.

tools.name: BERMUDA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for scRNA-seq batch effect removal
tools.detailed_description: BERMUDA (Batch Effect ReMoval Using Deep Autoencoders) is a transfer-learning-based method designed to correct batch effects in single-cell RNA sequencing data by aligning cell populations across batches.

tools.name: MOGONET
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics integration framework using Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: MOGONET is a framework for integrative analysis of multi-omics data (e.g., mRNA, DNA methylation, miRNA) using graph convolutional networks (GCN) for biomedical classification tasks.

tools.name: Seurat.utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for Seurat v5 single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions and utilities to extend the functionality of the Seurat package for single-cell RNA sequencing analysis.

tools.name: DALI
tools.one_line_profile: TCR/BCR analysis tool for Seurat ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: R package for the analysis of single-cell T-cell receptor (TCR) and B-cell receptor (BCR) profiling data, designed to integrate with the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: Vitessce
tools.one_line_profile: Visual integration tool for spatial single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A visual integration tool for exploration of spatial single-cell experiments, supporting various data formats and enabling interactive visualization of spatial and genomic data.

tools.name: scviR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for scvi-tools
tools.detailed_description: An experimental interface allowing R users to access scvi-tools, a popular Python library for deep probabilistic analysis of single-cell omics data.

tools.name: LIGER
tools.one_line_profile: R package for integrating multiple single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: LIGER (Linked Inference of Genomic Experimental Relationships) is an R package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets, enabling joint analysis of different datasets or modalities.

tools.name: PyLiger
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of LIGER for single-cell integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for integrating and analyzing multiple single-cell datasets, serving as the Python implementation of the LIGER method.

tools.name: scstGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal integration for spatial gene expression prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method based on Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and pathology image large models to predict single-cell resolution spatial gene expression by integrating multimodal information.

tools.name: CST
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-species epileptic seizure detection via multi-space alignment
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for epileptic seizure detection that leverages canine EEG data to help human analysis through cross-species and cross-modality alignment.

tools.name: CODA
tools.one_line_profile: Unified tool for spatial transcriptomics alignment and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for spatial transcriptomics that performs nonlinear alignment, common domain detection, and spatial differential gene analysis.

tools.name: MOVICS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics integration and Visualization in Cancer Subtyping
tools.detailed_description: An R package for multi-omics integration and visualization, specifically designed for cancer subtyping analysis.

tools.name: STAIG
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Transcriptomics Analysis via Image-Aided Graph Contrastive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for deciphering and alignment-free integration of spatial transcriptomics data using image-aided graph contrastive learning.

tools.name: bbknnR
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for Batch Balanced KNN (BBKNN)
tools.detailed_description: An R wrapper for the BBKNN (Batch Balanced k-Nearest Neighbors) Python package, used for fast batch effect correction in single-cell data.

tools.name: ADTnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization tool for CITE-seq ADT data
tools.detailed_description: ADTnorm normalizes cell surface protein measurements (ADT) in CITE-seq data to facilitate data integration across batches and studies.

tools.name: SCP
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end single-cell data analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R-based pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis, integrating functions for quality control, normalization, dimensionality reduction, clustering, and visualization.

tools.name: STAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial transcriptomics alignment and integration tool
tools.detailed_description: A graph attention auto-encoder based method for the alignment and integration of spatially resolved transcriptomics data across multiple slices.
